Prerequisites:
PREREQUISITES: COLLEGE LEVEL READING, WRITING AND MATH SKILLS ARE REQUIRED.
CREDIT FOR THIS COURSE DOES NOT APPLY TO THE ASSOCIATE IN ARTS DEGREE.
Course Description:
COVERS THEORY AND LOGIC THAT UNDERLIE ACCOUNTING PROCEDURES. COURSE CONTENT INCLUDES AN INTRODUCTION TO ACCOUNTING CONCEPTS, PROCEDURES
FOR READING BUSINESS TRANSACTIONS, PREPARATION OF FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, ACCOUNTING FOR MERCHANDISING CONCERNS, CORPORATIONS, BONDS, AND HER PROCEDURES TO CALCULATE AND MAINTAIN ACCOUNTING INFORMATION.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
